com.mesosphere.sdk.curator

Class CuratorLocker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.curator.CuratorLocker

  • public class CuratorLocker
extends java.lang.Object
    Gets an exclusive lock on service-specific ZK node to ensure two schedulers aren't running simultaneously for the same service.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static java.lang.String LOCK_PATH_NAME

      Broken out into a separate function to allow overrides in tests.

      Broken out into a separate function to allow overrides in tests.
      static void lock(java.lang.String serviceName, CuratorFrameworkFactory.Builder clientBuilder)
      Locks curator.
      (package private) void lockInternal()
      Gets an exclusive lock on service-specific ZK node to ensure two schedulers aren't running simultaneously for the same service.
      static void setEnabledForTests(boolean enabled)
      Allows disabling locking for unit tests of things that internally try to acquire a curator lock.
      (package private) static void unlock() 
      (package private) void unlockInternal()
      Releases the lock previously obtained via #lock().

    • Constructor Detail

      • CuratorLocker

        CuratorLocker(java.lang.String serviceName,
              CuratorFrameworkFactory.Builder clientBuilder)
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service to be locked
        zookeeperHostPort - the connection string for the ZK instance, e.g. master.mesos:2181

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        public static void lock(java.lang.String serviceName,
                        CuratorFrameworkFactory.Builder clientBuilder)
        Locks curator. This should only be called once per process. Throws if called a second time.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service to be locked
        zookeeperHostPort - the connection string for the ZK instance, e.g. master.mesos:2181

      • setEnabledForTests

        public static void setEnabledForTests(boolean enabled)
        Allows disabling locking for unit tests of things that internally try to acquire a curator lock.

      • unlock

        static void unlock()

      • lockInternal

        void lockInternal()
        Gets an exclusive lock on service-specific ZK node to ensure two schedulers aren't running simultaneously for the same service.

      • unlockInternal

        void unlockInternal()
        Releases the lock previously obtained via #lock().

      • getWaitTimeUnit

        protected java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit getWaitTimeUnit()
        Broken out into a separate function to allow overrides in tests.

        protected void exit()
        Broken out into a separate function to allow overrides in tests.
